DOC.detailed_description: The aim study characterize glycemic variability use linear nonlinear mathematical tool , basal condition response specific protocol acute exercise evoke oxidative stress inflammation healthy subject type 2 diabetes patient . For purpose , sample size consist 37 individual healthy 32 without type 2 diabetes mellitus , undertake two type exercise , randomly distribute . The maximal incremental exercise test perform electrically braked cycle ergometer ( ER-900 , Jaeger , Wu¨ rzburg , Germany ) order ass possible contraindication propose protocol well functional capacity , use prescription aerobic exercise session test strength maximal conduct used prescription eccentric exercise session . The glucose variability assess continuous glucose monitoring system ( CGMS ) 72h . Glucose variability evaluate glucose standard deviation , glucose variance , mean amplitude glycemic excursion ( MAGE ) , glucose coefficient variation ( conventional method ) well spectral symbolic analysis ( non-conventional method ) . The aerobic session consist 40 min low limb bicycle 70 % peak heart rate , determine incremental exercise test eccentric session consist 40 min one low -limb exercise ( leg press ) 6 set 10 repetition 120 % 1-RM .
